name: Pill Pusher (jrachele)
description:
Pill Pusher

Created by Tristan Ferrara and Julian Rachele

Psychiatry has a tenuous relationship with reality, as do the majority of the people in your office, especially Barbara. As a licensed (self-taught) physician, you are tasked with making as much money as possible balancing the mental state of your clients. If their appetite is a bit too much, put their bodies through the wringer until they can't think about anything, let alone food!

Hear your patients, look over your materials, and prescribe them with the proper medicinal cocktail to get their lives, and more importantly your financial situation, back on track! (Your bills has been affected)
